name: The Deep Wood
description:
Ludum dare 48
Theme : Deeper and Deeper

Game made in UE4

You will spawn in a mysterious forest where you have nothing but a gourd, a torch and some matchs, follow the road to hope get out of the forest.

move with : WASD or ZQSD
to pickup item : F
to use item : MSB

@shaonde music and sound design
@evrard 3D model
@lilpopopaulll made the map
@math-s Code the majority of the game
@m01 was here
